*Herein we describe the definitions and technicalities and concepts used throughout the reports created by BGsmartR*

Below we describe how we applied different concepts in the BGsmartR context. Our intention is not to provide a technical definition of concepts such as trees or species, but to specify how we defined them in the framework of our analyses.
